home.tagline: Fast, reliable open source support without subscriptions or license fees

slot_1.title: FAST, EASY ACCESS
slot_1.description: Describe your problem in seconds, get the right Experts started on your case and keep everyone on your team in the loop. The Dorsal web service makes it easy, fast and secure.

slot_2.title: COMMUNITY POWER
slot_2.description: Share, solve and collaborate on your case with the Dorsal community experts and anyone on your team

slot_3.title: PERSONALIZED TO YOU
slot_3.description: Tune the Dorsal service to meet your technology interests, company best practices and technical standards.
